title: Caught Offside: Transfer rumor juice, Rooney to MLS
description:
On this week's pod, the boys decide to embrace the madness and dive back in to the transfer rumor pool. Plus,. Jeff Carlisle joins to discuss Wayne Rooney taking the DC United job and we give our takeaways from United's 4-0 preseason win over Liverpool.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Barca & United transfers, Rooney to DC and England's humbling of Norway
